This facial nourishes and pampers your skin, as well as cleansing it thoroughly, leaving you with a radiant, glowing complexion.
This includes a brightening facial and dermaplaning to eliminate vellus hairs and dead skin for smoother, brighter skin.
Excellent for the removal of fine vellus hairs and the exfoliation of dead skin buildup for a smoother complexion.
Indulge in our Signature Facial, great for a regular pick-me-up and maintenance facial to keep your skin healthy and glowing.
Research shows that men may need regular facials more than women, owing to thicker skin and larger pores. This treatment addresses men's specific skincare needs.
Hydrating Facial is designed to soothe skin sensitivity and irritations by stopping the bacteria that cause breakouts and inflammation.
Traditional manicure including cuticle care, filing, hand exfoliation, followed by a moisturizing hand massage and polish application.

basicDetails.description: Our spa manicure is a refreshing hand treatment, featuring a lavish organic hand soak, gentle exfoliation, and a soothing massage with warm towels.
Spa manicure using heated basalt stones to provide deep relaxation, ease muscle tension, and improve circulation in the hands.
Milk and Honey are an ancient beauty ritual for soft, brighter and glowing skin. This luxurious treatment nourishes and rejuvenates hands.
Hot oil Manicure is the most luxurious hand treatment all over the world. We use warm essential oils to deeply moisturize and condition hands and cuticles.
Jelly enhances the toxin removal from the skin, and softens the skin. Jelly helps to heal dry skin and soothes sore and tired muscles.
This treatment uses paraffin wax therapy and aromatherapy to relive muscle tension and deeply moisturize the skin.
Nail polish application service only.
Our Classic Pedicure is a quick treatment that pampers your feet with a soothing foot soak, nail care, and polish application.
Immerse yourself in our spa pedicure featuring a lavish organic foot soak, meticulous exfoliation, and a rejuvenating massage with warm towels.
Super luxurious treatment that includes all the benefits of our signature pedicure plus hot stone massage and paraffin treatment.
Premium pedicure infused with heated or cooled basalt stones to deliver profound relaxation and therapeutic benefits.
Milk and Honey are an ancient beauty ritual for soft, brighter and glowing skin. This treatment brings luxury to your feet.

Excellent for skin resurfacing, acne management, pigmentation issues including melasma and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation.
Lactic acid is shown to inhibit tyrosinase enzyme activity directly, so it is a key performer in brightening treatments for hyperpigmentation.
